sections.original: Not fear, nor tears can reach me now
sections.spanish: Ni el miedo ni las lágrimas pueden alcanzarme ahora

sections.original: the light seems so clear as the night fades away
sections.spanish: la luz parece tan clara mientras la noche se desvanece

sections.original: Behold of thy flame, below of all shame
sections.spanish: Contempla tu llama, libre de toda vergüenza

sections.original: Come conquer me sweet dreams of paradise
sections.spanish: Ven y conquístame, dulces sueños de paraíso

sections.original: Dusk drawn hither to my evening star
sections.spanish: El crepúsculo atraído hasta mi estrella vespertina

sections.original: A glance in thy mirror
sections.spanish: Una mirada en tu espejo

sections.original: The trance of thy mirror
sections.spanish: El trance de tu espejo

sections.original: Venus... through the looking glass
sections.spanish: Venus... a través del espejo

sections.original: Dance so frail and lost in the fields afar
sections.spanish: Baila tan frágil y perdida en los campos lejanos

sections.original: Cast off thy mourning
sections.spanish: Despoja tu luto

sections.original: Clasp life and glory
sections.spanish: Abraza la vida y la gloria

sections.original: Venus... through the looking glass
sections.spanish: Venus... a través del espejo

sections.original: The sense of angels in veils of dawn
sections.spanish: El sentir de los ángeles en velos de aurora

sections.original: Like she runs forever among thy halls
sections.spanish: Como ella corre eternamente entre tus pasillos

sections.original: The pale horizons are closing down
sections.spanish: Los pálidos horizontes se cierran

sections.original: The reasons for living are lost somehow
sections.spanish: Las razones de vivir se han perdido de algún modo

sections.original: Cross my heart with a glance upon the star of riddance
sections.spanish: Jura por mi corazón con una mirada a la estrella del desencanto

sections.original: Drift afar like teardrops on the Stygian River
sections.spanish: Deriva lejos como gotas en el río Estigio

sections.original: I'm the nightfall and wizard that summon thee
sections.spanish: Soy el crepúsculo y el mago que te invoca

sections.original: You're the blizzard that drape my eyes
sections.spanish: Tú eres la ventisca que cubre mis ojos

sections.original: I'm thy sorrow and vein of obscurity
sections.spanish: Soy tu tristeza y vena de oscuridad

sections.original: You're the dagger that cuts
sections.spanish: Eres el puñal que hiere

sections.original: Shivers on the bleak horizon
sections.spanish: Escalofríos en el desolado horizonte

sections.original: Profound words... you're my frailty
sections.spanish: Palabras profundas... eres mi fragilidad

sections.original: See the light cease in thy life
sections.spanish: Ve la luz extinguirse en tu vida

sections.original: Profound words... hurting me
sections.spanish: Palabras profundas... hiriéndome

sections.original: Yearning for days of yore
sections.spanish: Anhelando los días de antaño

sections.original: in Elysian daydreams
sections.spanish: en ensoñaciones elíseas

sections.original: Burn with a fatal gloss
sections.spanish: Arde con un brillo fatal

sections.original: a confounding mirror of souls
sections.spanish: un espejo desconcertante de almas

sections.original: Dance with the winterwinds
sections.spanish: Baila con los vientos invernales

sections.original: in thy visions so sanguine
sections.spanish: en tus visiones tan sanguíneas

sections.original: Glance upon Stygian streams
sections.spanish: Mira los arroyos estigios

sections.original: where lies hidden a pale secrecy
sections.spanish: donde yace oculta una pálida secreta

sections.original: Hark...
sections.spanish: ¡Escucha...

sections.original: lures of the siren
sections.spanish: atracciones de la sirena

sections.original: yearn for the days when blithe thou was
sections.spanish: anhelas los días en que eras alegre

sections.original: Sworn to a secrecy
sections.spanish: Juraste silencio

sections.original: an arcanum devotee
sections.spanish: devoto de un arcano

sections.original: Mourning a life with thee
sections.spanish: Lamentando una vida contigo

sections.original: a descendance of watery argentine
sections.spanish: una descendencia de plata acuosa

sections.original: Trance of thy frailty
sections.spanish: Trance de tu fragilidad

sections.original: endure the exsanguine
sections.spanish: resiste lo exanguíneo

sections.original: Glance beyond closed eyelids
sections.spanish: Mira más allá de párpados cerrados

sections.original: the conundrum of all mysteries
sections.spanish: el enigma de todos los misterios

sections.original: Crossing in life... my heart
sections.spanish: Cruzando en la vida... mi corazón

sections.original: with silver in times... I'm weak
sections.spanish: con plata en los tiempos... soy débil

sections.original: too weak...
sections.spanish: demasiado débil...

sections.original: Wan circling skies
sections.spanish: Cielos pálidos y errantes

sections.original: secretes... silvering sorrow
sections.spanish: destila... pena plateada

sections.original: Precious to me Aphelion
sections.spanish: Querido para mí, Afelio

sections.original: Thou are the fields where we wither still
sections.spanish: Eres los campos donde aún nos marchitamos

sections.original: Exhaust in thy waning world
sections.spanish: Agótate en tu mundo menguante

sections.original: My Aphelion
sections.spanish: Mi Afelio

sections.original: on a broken mirror
sections.spanish: en un espejo roto

sections.original: where the veils of night and day seems as one
sections.spanish: donde los velos de noche y día parecen uno

sections.original: May thy lids gather again
sections.spanish: Que tus párpados se reúnan de nuevo

sections.original: on a vast and frail crusade
sections.spanish: en una vasta y frágil cruzada

sections.original: Invigoration of pain pervation this time
sections.spanish: Invigora el dolor, pervierte esta vez

sections.original: Checkered by the dawn, enslaved in life enthralling
sections.spanish: Tableado por el amanecer, esclavizado en la fascinación vital

sections.original: Swept up by the mortal waste of my enslaved emotion
sections.spanish: Arrastrado por el desperdicio mortal de mi emoción esclavizada

sections.original: Agents of the cross in argentine frailty
sections.spanish: Agentes de la cruz en fragilidad argéntea

sections.original: Hopefully you'll stop him and delay the conquering angina
sections.spanish: Ojalá lo detengas y retrases la angina conquistadora

sections.original: Hopefully you'll stop him and delay the conquering...
sections.spanish: Ojalá lo detengas y retrases la conquista...

sections.original: In decadence I take thee by the hand
sections.spanish: En la decadencia te tomo de la mano

sections.original: too frail...to gain the promised land
sections.spanish: demasiado frágil... para alcanzar la tierra prometida

sections.original: too frail...to take your pain away
sections.spanish: demasiado frágil... para aliviar tu dolor

sections.original: too frail...a sequel of decay
sections.spanish: demasiado frágil... una secuela de descomposición

sections.original: May millenniums gather
sections.spanish: Que milenios se reúnan

sections.original: on the mirage of desolated souls
sections.spanish: sobre el espejismo de almas desoladas

sections.original: far between departure and sorrow
sections.spanish: lejos entre la partida y el dolor

sections.original: I breed my afterthought
sections.spanish: engendro mi reflexión tardía

sections.original: In thy hours of vast dejection's haunt... wane
sections.spanish: En tus horas del vasto acecho de la desolación... mengua

sections.original: Checkered by the dawn, enslaved in life enthralling
sections.spanish: Tableado por el amanecer, esclavizado en la fascinación vital

sections.original: Swept up by the mortal waste of my enslaved emotion
sections.spanish: Arrastrado por el desperdicio mortal de mi emoción esclavizada

sections.original: Agents of the cross in argentine frailty
sections.spanish: Agentes de la cruz en fragilidad argéntea

sections.original: Hopefully you'll stop him and delay the conquering angina
sections.spanish: Ojalá lo detengas y retrases la angina conquistadora

sections.original: Hopefully you'll stop him and delay the conquering...
sections.spanish: Ojalá lo detengas y retrases la conquista...

sections.original: An angel strays upon my door
sections.spanish: Un ángel vaga ante mi puerta

sections.original: so frail and lost within
sections.spanish: tan frágil y perdido en su interior

sections.original: To weep upon her days of yore
sections.spanish: Para llorar sus días de antaño

sections.original: my decadent come in
sections.spanish: mi decadencia entra

sections.original: Her stain and tears upon my floor
sections.spanish: Su mancha y lágrimas sobre mi suelo

sections.original: the sorrow that she brings
sections.spanish: el dolor que trae

sections.original: Devotion of a life outworn
sections.spanish: Devoción de una vida gastada

sections.original: in decadence come in
sections.spanish: entra en decadencia

sections.original: May thy lids desorb from emerald seas
sections.spanish: Que tus párpados se desprendan de mares esmeralda

sections.original: a pending solitary
sections.spanish: una soledad inminente

sections.original: Though thy pain redeems, life it seems to be
sections.spanish: Aunque tu dolor redima, la vida parece ser

sections.original: a fragile sanctuary
sections.spanish: un frágil santuario

sections.original: Challenge my own world to chaos
sections.spanish: Desafío a mi propio mundo al caos

sections.original: Thoughts to mind becomes my arch enemies
sections.spanish: Los pensamientos se vuelven mis archienemigos

sections.original: Skin to teeth... visions appears to me in red
sections.spanish: Piel a dientes... visiones me aparecen en rojo

sections.original: Scouring my wounds with your spit
sections.spanish: Escudriñando mis heridas con tu saliva

sections.original: Down in apathy which is growing
sections.spanish: Sumido en la apatía que crece

sections.original: Once dragged down within a mayhem of light
sections.spanish: Una vez arrastrado dentro de un caos de luz

sections.original: Skin to teeth... ripping my inwards apart
sections.spanish: Piel a dientes... desgarrando mi interior

sections.original: Poisoned with wine from the sick
sections.spanish: Envenenado con vino de los enfermos

sections.original: Silent to drowse with the phantoms
sections.spanish: Silencioso al adormecerme con los fantasmas

sections.original: and let the fire engulf me
sections.spanish: y deja que el fuego me consuma

sections.original: Sanguine rebirth
sections.spanish: Renacimiento sanguíneo

sections.original: Sanguine divined rebirth
sections.spanish: Renacimiento divinamente sanguíneo

sections.original: Now your faces facing me
sections.spanish: Ahora tus rostros se enfrentan a mí

sections.original: as transparent masks
sections.spanish: como máscaras transparentes

sections.original: I'm pyretic to all heedful dead souls
sections.spanish: Estoy febril ante todas las almas muertas atentas

sections.original: claiming lands where even angels fear to tread
sections.spanish: reclamando tierras donde incluso los ángeles temen pisar

sections.original: I am torture disguised
sections.spanish: Soy tortura disfrazada

sections.original: Named by man as a creeping Jesus
sections.spanish: Nombrado por el hombre como un Jesús andante

sections.original: All heedful souls
sections.spanish: Todas las almas atentas

sections.original: All heedful...
sections.spanish: Todas atentas...

sections.original: Still they pester me
sections.spanish: Aún me persiguen

sections.original: Still they haunt... as placidity is borned
sections.spanish: Aún me acechan... mientras nace la placidez

sections.original: The remembrance... age of innocence lost
sections.spanish: El recuerdo... era de inocencia perdida

sections.original: Ascend...
sections.spanish: Asciende...

sections.original: Fire dance with me
sections.spanish: Baila fuego conmigo

sections.original: let me be the most licentious martyr
sections.spanish: déjame ser el mártir más licencioso

sections.original: Sear me
sections.spanish: Quémame

sections.original: Rise my clandestines, thy secrecies invoked
sections.spanish: Levántense, mis clandestinos, invocadas tus secrecias

sections.original: Streams of argentine across eyelids are drawn
sections.spanish: Corrientes de plata se dibujan sobre párpados

sections.original: Rise upon the tide, my castaway's outworn
sections.spanish: Surge con la marea, mi náufrago agotado

sections.original: Fall from distant worlds and redeyed skies above
sections.spanish: Cae de mundos distantes y cielos enrojecidos arriba

sections.original: Gesture of an argentine moisture
sections.spanish: Gesto de humedad plateada

sections.original: like snow upon the riverine
sections.spanish: como nieve sobre el río

sections.original: Gesture of an argentine moisture
sections.spanish: Gesto de humedad plateada

sections.original: so sore upon congeal skin
sections.spanish: tan dolorosa sobre la piel helada

sections.original: Ardency of life forsakened
sections.spanish: Ardor de vida abandonada

sections.original: time will gather the source of thy secrecies
sections.spanish: el tiempo reunirá la fuente de tus secrecias

sections.original: Ardency of life forsakened
sections.spanish: Ardor de vida abandonada

sections.original: in swarthy hours thou ponder still
sections.spanish: en horas sombrías aún reflexionas

sections.original: Invoke thy aeons in a dream
sections.spanish: Invoca tus eones en un sueño

sections.original: entrancing sleep
sections.spanish: sueño hipnótico

sections.original: profound and prolix
sections.spanish: profundo y prolijo

sections.original: Estranged to life's utility
sections.spanish: Alejado de la utilidad de la vida

sections.original: Bequest thy endurance in the times of
sections.spanish: Legado tu resistencia en los tiempos de

sections.original: lethargic
sections.spanish: letargo

sections.original: Lead me down in wailing hours
sections.spanish: Guíame en horas de llanto

sections.original: to the riverside
sections.spanish: a la orilla del río

sections.original: Reveal to me thy secrecies
sections.spanish: Revela tus secrecias

sections.original: hidden in the wan deep of thy infinite mourning
sections.spanish: ocultas en lo pálido y profundo de tu luto infinito

sections.original: Lethean river carry me beneath thy riverine
sections.spanish: Río Letheo, llévame bajo tu cauce

sections.original: Life gains intensified pain
sections.spanish: La vida gana dolor intensificado

sections.original: to ascend within me once again
sections.spanish: para ascender dentro de mí una vez más

sections.original: Woe strikes through radiant light
sections.spanish: La aflicción golpea con luz radiante

sections.original: a quitus has conquered thy eyes
sections.spanish: un descanso ha conquistado tus ojos

sections.original: the sequel of life
sections.spanish: la secuela de la vida

sections.original: Arising grievance rage through the eyes
sections.spanish: Ira que surge y atraviesa los ojos

sections.original: of our existence a thousand times
sections.spanish: de nuestra existencia mil veces

sections.original: The strife drawn hither as a daydream
sections.spanish: La lucha atraída aquí como un sueño diurno

sections.original: ascendancy
sections.spanish: ascenso

sections.original: In life we wither like laurel leaves in winterwinds
sections.spanish: En la vida nos marchitamos como hojas de laurel en vientos invernales

sections.original: Lurk far between
sections.spanish: Acecha lejos entre

sections.original: a pale destiny
sections.spanish: un destino pálido

sections.original: drawn from the past
sections.spanish: extraído del pasado

sections.original: Enclasp my wrath in the prophecy of thine
sections.spanish: Encierra mi ira en tu profecía

sections.original: Perchance to dream... Day of ire prithee
sections.spanish: Quizá soñar... Día de ira, te suplico

sections.original: behold the haven of life
sections.spanish: contempla el refugio de la vida

sections.original: Perchance to dream... Day of ire prithee
sections.spanish: Quizá soñar... Día de ira, te suplico

sections.original: may daylight draw thy veils aside
sections.spanish: que la luz del día quite tus velos

sections.original: Summon the winterwind in which I walk
sections.spanish: Invoca el viento invernal en el que camino

sections.original: Enter the morning glades of a fallen deathwish
sections.spanish: Entra en los claros matutinos de un deseo de muerte caído

sections.original: Summon the starlight gloss in which thou rage
sections.spanish: Invoca el brillo estelar en el que rabias

sections.original: Enter the mourning shades
sections.spanish: Entra en las sombras de luto

sections.original: Call out in vain for thee again
sections.spanish: Clama en vano por ti de nuevo

sections.original: Perchance to dream you're my dancing queen
sections.spanish: Quizá soñar que eres mi reina danzante

sections.original: behold the haven of life
sections.spanish: contempla el refugio de la vida

sections.original: Perchance to dream... Day of ire prithee
sections.spanish: Quizá soñar... Día de ira, te suplico

sections.original: may daylight draw thy veils aside
sections.spanish: que la luz del día quite tus velos

sections.original: A strike of angina
sections.spanish: Un ataque de angina

sections.original: Enthralled by the night and the shades at thy side
sections.spanish: Fascinado por la noche y las sombras a tu lado

sections.original: A star of riddance rage through the sky
sections.spanish: Una estrella de liberación arde en el cielo

sections.original: Grant me thy visions... bequeath me life
sections.spanish: Concédeme tus visiones... otórgame la vida

sections.original: Through times of yearning... on a path of indignity
sections.spanish: A través de tiempos de anhelo... en un camino de indignidad

sections.original: No longer burning... at last this life's circuit I leave
sections.spanish: Ya sin arder... al fin dejo el ciclo de esta vida

sections.original: Through scornful declarence and luminous eyes
sections.spanish: A través de declaraciones desdeñosas y ojos luminosos

sections.original: the shadows enveil with the glorious night
sections.spanish: las sombras se visten con la noche gloriosa

sections.original: Trespassing the sunset like thou hast before
sections.spanish: Trasgrediendo el atardecer como lo has hecho antes

sections.original: Entreating the daylight to rage nevermore
sections.spanish: Suplicando al día que nunca más furie

sections.original: Angina striking Elysium
sections.spanish: La angina golpeando Elíseo

sections.original: A frail remembrance glorificates the nightside-ascendance
sections.spanish: Un recuerdo frágil glorifica la ascensión nocturna

sections.original: veiled underneath thy funereal skies
sections.spanish: velado bajo tus cielos funerarios

sections.original: The winds they may haunt me in bloodredest skies
sections.spanish: Los vientos pueden atormentarme en cielos sangrerojísimos

sections.original: The moon may bewed the strangest of light
sections.spanish: La luna puede conceder la luz más extraña

sections.original: The clasp of indifference the conquering tide
sections.spanish: El abrazo de la indiferencia, la marea conquistadora

sections.original: The sweeping of daylight... my vigour's decline
sections.spanish: El avance de la luz diurna... mi vigor declina

sections.original: Thy Carrion Kind
sections.spanish: Tu clase carroñera

sections.spanish: La angina golpea Elíseo... un recuerdo frágil

sections.spanish: Clase carroñera

sections.spanish: Mi clase carroñera

sections.original: Let us be the ones
sections.spanish: Seamos nosotros

sections.original: to put the thorn in thy eye
sections.spanish: los que pongamos la espina en tu ojo

sections.original: ...let us be the ones
sections.spanish: ...seamos nosotros

sections.original: Squalid the weak stumbles
sections.spanish: Sórdido, el débil tropieza

sections.original: through all of life's obscurities
sections.spanish: a través de todas las oscuridades de la vida

sections.original: Lost in sacrilege
sections.spanish: Perdido en sacrilegio

sections.original: Revere the name
sections.spanish: Reverencia al nombre

sections.original: Accept the modesty
sections.spanish: Acepta la modestia

sections.original: Falter through speres of the pain
sections.spanish: Falla a través de las esferas del dolor

sections.original: Exhausted hours... Exhausted hours
sections.spanish: Horas extenuadas... horas extenuadas

sections.original: Nothing from thy world will remain thine
sections.spanish: Nada de tu mundo te quedará

sections.original: except the very privilege to die
sections.spanish: excepto el privilegio de morir

sections.original: Squalid the weak stumbles...
sections.spanish: Sórdido, el débil tropieza...

sections.original: Orgasmic Mass Hysteria!
sections.spanish: ¡Histeria de masa orgásmica!

sections.original: You're creeping for a charlatan god
sections.spanish: Te arrastras por un dios charlatán

sections.original: Awake...
sections.spanish: Despierta...

sections.original: Resurrection of a horrid dream
sections.spanish: Resurrección de un sueño horrendo

sections.original: Blend of hate and intense desire
sections.spanish: Mezcla de odio y deseo intenso

sections.original: Putrify
sections.spanish: Pudrir

sections.original: Vile... surreal
sections.spanish: Vil... surrealista
